Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah was named Player of the Match for his bowling figures of 2/19.
Rohit Sharma scored 86 runs off 63 balls, including 6 fours and 6 sixes.
Shreyas Iyer scored an unbeaten 53 off 62 balls.
India won by 7 wickets with 117 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India elected to field first after winning the toss.
The match was held at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad.
India earned 2 points from this match, while Pakistan earned 0 points.
